AI Description: readr is a R package used for reading flat/tabular text files into R easily and efficiently. It provides a high-performance and user-friendly way to import structured data from files.
Core Features: Efficient Reading Of Delimited Files, Support For Various File Formats Like Csv, Tsv, Fwf, Consistent & Predictable Behavior For Column Types, Easy Handling Of File Encoding & Column Specification
General Tags: Data Import, Data Processing, Data Manipulation
